headline: Entergy Corporation (NYSE:ETR): Offering a Generous Risk-Adjusted Return
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Entergy Corporation (NYSE:ETR) on ValueInvestorsClub by cable888. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on ETR. The company’s shares were trading at $81.66 when this thesis was published, vs. the closing price of $83.88 on Mar 21. ETR engages in the production and retail distribution of […]
